name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with over 13 years of experience in designing and developing high-performance applications, primarily focusing on **API standards**, **distributed systems design patterns**, and **event-driven architectures**. Proficient in **TypeScript**, and experienced with **Golang** alongside a robust technology stack including **JavaScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Skilled in implementing **Kafka** for streaming data and applying **CAP Theorem** principles to ensure system reliability and availability.
Expert in building AI technologies that support predictive analytics and real-time data processing, with hands-on experience in deploying cloud-native architectures on **AWS** and **Azure**. Demonstrated ability to implement **Backend for Frontend (BFF) patterns**, enhancing developer experience and application performance.
Proficient in CI/CD pipeline development and well-versed in compliance-driven practices aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Possess strong communication skills, with a deep sense of ownership and accountability towards delivered solutions.
